summary: Changes the female Forsworn Headress to act like a circlet and modifies the way it looks.
descriptionHtml:
Changes the female Forsworn Headress to act like a circlet and modifies the way it looks.  It goes over the hair, so there will be more variety because each forsworn female has a different hair style.

This IS a replacer, it will change all the female forsworn helms, does not affect male forsworn helms

There also might be a Armor of the old gods fix in here too, i forget, made this awhile ago and am only posting it now for another mod im doing.

--------
There are now 3 versions; ForswornHAIR(normal), ForswornHAIR - No Horns(only feathers), ForswornHAIR - Less Feathers(Less Feathers and takes care of the floating ones you see with some hair styles)

--------
Conflicts/Load order

If you use \"Forsworn Armor - Matching Set and Craftable by Belthazor82\" ... place that plug-in before this mod\'s esp (ForswornHAIR.esp); if not the gals will look like they received the worst buzz cut in the world. <LOL> You will also lose the option to make or improve the Forsworn headdress but the simple fix is to temporarily disable this mod. Make and/or improve your headdresses and fire up the mod again.
author: DrMiller
